title: Canción de barrio (2014)
overview: Documentary collecting some experiences of the first two years of the "Gira interminable" tour were Silvio Rodriguez performs for the marginal neighborhoods of Havana and other provinces.
storyline: In 2010 a musical tour began that would go deep into Cuba. Completed after two years of travel, the experiences weave a map of invisible Cuba, whose complexity is revealed through the voices of the film's participants. English subtitles coming soon.
